lyrics.text:
Ke mou fakaongo
‘A e Lami lelei,
‘A hotau ‘Otua
Ko e hifo ia;
He kuo hokosia mai
‘A e ta’u ‘o e Siupeli.

‘A e kau pōpula
Ki he angahala,
Mo heli, mou ma’u
Homou ‘atāina;
He kuo hokosia mai
‘A e ta’u ‘o e Siupeli.

Pea ke mou nofo
‘O fiemālie
‘I ho’omou tui
Ki he Eiki lelei;
He kuo hokosia mai
‘A e ta’u ‘o e Siupeli.

Mo kimoutolu na
Na’a mou fakatau,
‘A homou ‘api tō
Mou ha’u ‘o toe ma’u;
He kuo hokosia mai
‘A e ta’u ‘o e Siupeli.

Ko e fu’u ‘ofa
‘Ofa tu’unga’a pē,
‘A Sīsū totonu
Ko hotau Huhu’i;
He kuo hokosia mai
‘A e ta’u ‘o e Siupeli.
